meanings.definition: Tea: a hot drink made by infusing the dried, crushed leaves of the tea plant in boiling water.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy a cup of te in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She likes to have te with honey.
meanings.sent3: The te was so hot, it burned my tongue!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of te filled the room like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The te leaves danced in the boiling water, releasing their flavor.

meanings.definition: You: used to refer to the person or people being addressed.
meanings.sent2: Can te please pass the salt?
meanings.sent3: Te, yes te, are the one I'm talking to!
meanings.sent4: In a crowd, te stood out like a shining star.
meanings.sent5: Te, with the kind eyes, listened attentively.

meanings.definition: Ten: the number equivalent to the sum of nine and one; one more than nine.
meanings.sent1: I have te fingers on my hands.
meanings.sent2: Te students lined up for the school bus.
meanings.sent3: Te balloons floated in the sky, one for each year.
meanings.sent4: The clock struck te, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: Te is the number of fingers on two hands combined.
